mapper.select: SELECT t.detail_id AS detailId, t.`CONTENT` FROM basis_tb_job_detail t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.job_id = #{jobId} ORDER BY t.`RANK`
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basis_tb_job_detail ( JOB_ID, CONTENT, RANK, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #{jobId}, #{content}, #{rank}, 'U', NOW(), #{modifyUser}, NOW(), #{modifyUser} )
